alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 12:47PM CDT until May 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau affecting Webster, Bossier, Bienville and Red River Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau. * WHEN...From late Monday night to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 142.5 feet, Expect some minor flooding of low area camps, however, all access roadways will remain open. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 142.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 142.5 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 142.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 142.6 feet on 04/06/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 1245 PM CDT.
